title: Trump Waffles on DACA, Responds to Hurricane Irma: A Closer Look | Sarah Jenks-Daly & Kyle O'Donnell
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how Donald Trump is exposing how unfit for the presidency he is through his handling of crises from all sides, from hurricanes to immigration reform. (0:20)
Then, in a new edition of Late Night Chats, Late Night supervising producer Sarah Jenks-Daly and junior talent booker Kyle O'Donnell discuss working on the show. (9:36)
